grip_lessons.description: With an improved grip technique, you feel more powerful! You can now also throw enemies!

cold_showers.description: Nothing as revitalizing as a cold shower! You feel invigorated! Your health and stamina have improved greatly.

shaman_blessing.description: The blessing of the shaman runs through your body, and in a flash of insight you learn the sacred Heavenly Slam technique.

eagle_training_scroll.description: The blessing of the shaman runs through your body, and in a flash of insight you learn the sacred Heavenly Slam technique.

slap.name: Mongolian Slapâ„¢
slap.description: Not sure what makes it mongolian, but they own it

throw.name: Throw
throw.description: Throws your opponent up in the air, making them fall. Hurts...

slam.name: Heavenly Slam
slam.description: Jump up in the air with your opponent, turning them around twice and slamming them face first into the ground. Boom!

loremaster.name: Storytime
loremaster.description: Tell your adversary all about the history you've uncovered so far, making them sympathise with you

rend.name: Rend Slam
rend.description: Jump up in the air with your opponent, turning them around twice and slamming them face first into the ground. Boom!

slime.name: Slime
slime.description: Slimes are a pest in this desert, I think there's a reward for eradicating all of them

snake.name: Snake
snake.description: Very kawaii, but don't let them cuddle you to death.

wolf.name: Wolf
wolf.description: Despite its adoring looks, it's out for your blood!.

alpha.name: Alpha Wolf
alpha.description: You've really done it this time Bataar... This wolf commands all the wolves in this entire region. Surely defeating it warrants a reward...

copy.name: Bataar???
copy.description: You're not sure why you're fighting your alter image?

bolkhi.name: Bolkhi
bolkhi.description: You're not sure why you're wrestling this guy every day

descriptions: I wonder who lives here? They are clearly short on water..
Blood isn't my thing. But we don't always have a choice.
That.. Is a lot of Kumis. Who would of thought, fermented mare's milk could be so tasty!
Ah, Kumis. I think I'm better off not getting drunk right now.
It looks like I know where to go if I get thirsty.
Hm, I wonder what's in here?
Wait a second.. What's this doing here? Kinda sus.
Everyone seems to be running low on resources these days.
Mmm, wild garlic! These are pretty rare!
That's enough dried meat to last a year!
Cheese curds. Won't be running out of that any time soon..
Just a bed. I can sleep here.
It looks like noone has lived here in a long time. Sleeping here will be painful.
A Saxual Tree. Pretty much the only wood you'll find out here in the Gobi.
When I get that feeling, I want Saxual healing.
A Barrel Cactus. They can actually live to over 100 years old.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: You here again?

dialogue.speaker: copy
dialogue.text: A copy? I'm the real Bataar, jerk! I was put here for testing purposes

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Right... I'll be leaving

dialogue.speaker: copy
dialogue.text: How did you like the fight with those slimes?!

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Pfft! Easy!

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: -huff, huff- Nothing like a good wrestle first thing in the morning!

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: -huff, huff, huff- I can't say I feel the same Bolkhi..

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: Bahahahah, quit whining. Grab your things and lets go!!!

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Uhm, actually I've got a lot of stuff to do today..

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: Oh come on! I've been asking you for months! I'm not saying we need to join. But we have to at least check it out!

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Karakorum will still be there tomorrow Bolkhi..

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: Yea. And the next day, and the day after that. So lets just go today!

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Everyone whos gone never comes back Bolkhi. They just stay there. You know that.

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: And? You're telling me you just want to wander these fields forever?

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: We could be part of something big!

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: I just- I still have some holes to patch on my yurt..

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: And I found a really nice patch of grass that I wanted to nap on..

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: I get it Bataar. This is all I've known too. But.. I just feel like we could be so much more. Ya know?

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: I know Bolkhi.. Just. Give me some time.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: I need to think about it a bit more...

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: Alright. Maybe go see the [tornado radius=5 freq=2]Shaman up North[/tornado]?

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: He always has something helpful to say.

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: Oh and don't forget! If you press [TAB] you can have your eagle, Burg, help you find it.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: That's a pretty good idea. Alright. Thanks Bolkhi.

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: And hey, Bataar, no matter what you decide, I'm always here for you.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: For better or worse.

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: For better!

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: That.. Wasn't a question.

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: Oh! Yea I knew that.

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: -huff, huff- Nothing like a good wrestle first thing in the morning!

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: I can't say I disagree, hahah.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: You're out of breath though Bolkhi. You should probably exercise a bit more.

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: Yea yea tough guy, you know I usually win.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: So do you have everything packed up?

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: Are you serious!?

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Yea actually. Yea I am.

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: WOOOOOO!!! Lets gooooo!

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: I can't help but wonder though Bataar..

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: What made you change your mind?

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Well.. A wise man once told me..

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: You either choose to let your life change you.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Or you choose to change your life.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: And.. I know no matter what happens Bolkhi.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: I've got you.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: And you always have me too.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: So..

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: ..Lets go change the world.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Ah, what do we have here? A perfect copy of me?

dialogue.speaker: copy
dialogue.text: A copy? I'm the real Bataar, jerk! I was put here for testing purposes

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Right... I'll be leaving

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Still here?

dialogue.speaker: copy
dialogue.text: Still here?

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: You. Me. Now.

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: Bataar!! Are you ready!?

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Oh right.. I almost forgot, about that-

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: - Because here I come!!

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Still here?

dialogue.speaker: copy
dialogue.text: Still here?

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: You. Me. Now.

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: Bataar!! Are you ready!?

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Actually-

dialogue.speaker: bolkhi
dialogue.text: - Because here I come!!

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Still here?

dialogue.speaker: copy
dialogue.text: Still here?

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: You. Me. Now.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Greetings.. Wise one.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Greetings.. Wise one.

dialogue.speaker: shaman
dialogue.text: You may ask. But YOU must answer.

dialogue.speaker: shaman
dialogue.text: We all seek answers.

dialogue.speaker: shaman
dialogue.text: Walk the path, seek the shrines of the Tengri.

dialogue.speaker: shaman
dialogue.text: And find your answer.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: What path..?

dialogue.speaker: shaman
dialogue.text: To the East, you will find the cave shrine of Boz Tengri.

dialogue.speaker: shaman
dialogue.text: To the North West, you will find the cave shrine of Od Tengri.

dialogue.speaker: shaman
dialogue.text: And to the North, you will find the final cave shrine of Kok Tengri.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: What path..?

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Can you remind me of the path?

dialogue.speaker: shaman
dialogue.text: To the East, you will find the cave shrine of Boz Tengri.

dialogue.speaker: shaman
dialogue.text: To the North West, you will find the cave shrine of Od Tengri.

dialogue.speaker: shaman
dialogue.text: And to the North, you will find the final cave shrine of Kok Tengri.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Am I dead?

dialogue.speaker: boz
dialogue.text: Far from it. I am Boz Tengri, of the Tengri.

dialogue.speaker: boz
dialogue.text: For what purpose have you called upon me this day?

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: ...-Takes a deep breath-...

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: I'm afraid, Boz.

dialogue.speaker: boz
dialogue.text: Please, explain.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: I have a chance to change my entire life.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: To join something with real purpose.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: But all I've ever known is this land, these fields.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: I'm not sure if I can leave it all behind.

dialogue.speaker: boz
dialogue.text: I see.

dialogue.speaker: boz
dialogue.text: However, no matter where you go in this world Bataar..

dialogue.speaker: boz
dialogue.text: This land will forever remain under your feet.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: ..I suppose you're right.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Thank you for your wise words Boz Tengri.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: ..but how do you know my name? Wait!

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: There's nothing left for me here

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Such beautiful inscriptions. Nothing is happening... I wonder if someone can help me.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Nothing is happening... I should remember what the shaman told me.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Hello..?

dialogue.speaker: od
dialogue.text: Greetings young one. I am Ã–d Tengri, of the Tengri.

dialogue.speaker: od
dialogue.text: For what purpose have you called upon me this day?

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: I have a chance to change my entire life..

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: To spend my time on something other than myself.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: But I enjoy being able to do what I want.. When I want..

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: That must sound selfish..

dialogue.speaker: od
dialogue.text: Ah but your time is precious, Bataar.

dialogue.speaker: od
dialogue.text: Compared to the ocean, and the sky, and the soil beneath your feet..

dialogue.speaker: od
dialogue.text: Your time here is brief.

dialogue.speaker: od
dialogue.text: However, the mark that you leave on this world when you are gone Bataar.

dialogue.speaker: od
dialogue.text: That, will last far longer.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: ... You're right.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Thank you for your wise words Od Tengri.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: There's nothing left for me here

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Such beautiful inscriptions. Nothing is happening... I wonder if someone can help me.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Nothing is happening... I should remember what the shaman told me.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: I had come to seek your council.. Oh wise God of the Gods.

dialogue.speaker: kok
dialogue.text: Oh? 'Had', you say. Has something changed?

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: 'I' have changed.. I didn't even see it happen.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: I've fended off beasts.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: I've traversed the depths of caves.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: I've scaled this mountain.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: All to find an answer to a question, that I already knew..

dialogue.speaker: kok
dialogue.text: Hahahah, ah Bataar.

dialogue.speaker: kok
dialogue.text: You're a brave and courageous young man.

dialogue.speaker: kok
dialogue.text: Change is inevitable.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: You're absolutely right.

dialogue.speaker: kok
dialogue.text: There are only 2 true choices, Bataar.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: I could stay here, content. Grow old and die.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Or I can use this time I have, this time I've been blessed with.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: To be a part of something greater then myself.

dialogue.speaker: kok
dialogue.text: Very wise words Bataar.

dialogue.speaker: kok
dialogue.text: You either choose to let your life change you.

dialogue.speaker: kok
dialogue.text: Or you choose to change your life.

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Tengri, I can not thank you and your sons enough.

dialogue.speaker: kok
dialogue.text: Hahahahah, nonsense Bataar.

dialogue.speaker: kok
dialogue.text: It has been our pleasure.

dialogue.speaker: kok
dialogue.text: Now, step forward into the world.

dialogue.speaker: kok
dialogue.text: And change it!

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: You here again?

dialogue.speaker: copy
dialogue.text: A copy? I'm the real Bataar, jerk! I was put here for testing purposes

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: Right... I'll be leaving

dialogue.speaker: bataar
dialogue.text: There's nothing left for me here
